## Matrix3x3.getCol() method

Get the values in a column as a Vector3

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCol(col: number, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  col | number | The column index |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector, if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The output vector
